queriesDict.name: USER_EVENTS
queriesDict.statement: SELECT DISTINCT EVT.USER_ID FROM {SCHEMA}DQMUSR_EVENTS EVT JOIN {SCHEMA}DQMUSR_USER U ON EVT.USER_ID = U.ID AND U.USERTYPE = 'E' WHERE U.USERNAME = @param{USERNAME}
UPDATE {SCHEMA}DQMUSR_EVENTS SET FESTSTELLUNG_DFUE_FEHLER = 'TRUE', BELASTUNG_DFUE_SENDUNG = 'TRUE' WHERE USER_ID IN (@statement{SELECT.USER.FOR.LNR})
